abstract: Intel plans to proclaim that the next big thing in consumer gadgets will be the “Internet in your pocket.”
snippet: Intel plans to proclaim that the next big thing in consumer gadgets will be the “Internet in your pocket.”
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Intel plans to proclaim Wednesday in Shanghai that the next big thing in consumer gadgets will be the “Internet in your pocket.”

headline.main: Intel Makes a Push Into Pocket-Size Internet Devices
headline.print_headline: Intel Makes a Push Into Pocket-Size Internet Devices
